title: "Alfabet Praema"

*This book should have little pictures to show each different letter, to help children when they're starting to learn to read. The text was devised at a workshop with primary school and kindergarten teachers across Southeast Ambrym in January 2020.*

*I'm still looking for a local artist to finish these pictures, but for now we just have a few drawn by John. If you know someone from Southeast Ambrym you can draw well and would be interesting in this work, please contact me.*
